name: OzVania
description:
Latest version:
- 4 levels (up from 3)
- 900 seconds time bonus (up from 300)
- you can reset high scores (warning: it will delete all player prefs)

To play: 
- Left mouse click to fire 
- A and D keys to move 
- Space bar to jump

Once you complete the levels, whatever is left on the time bonus is added to your score.

------------------------------------------------------

Created using GameDev.tv course material including art assets.
